headline: GE HealthCare introduces advanced imaging solutions powered by NVIDIA technology to support timely diagnoses and streamlined clinical workflows
summary: CHICAGO, December 02, 2025--At the Radiological Society of North America (RSNA) 2025 Annual Meeting, GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) is showcasing several innovations brought to life through an expanded collaboration with NVIDIA. This collaboration underscores GE HealthCare’s ongoing commitment to integrating advanced technologies that aim to transform healthcare delivery and improve patient care.
